title: Habermas The Structural Transformation Of The Public Sphere

sources.title: HabermasTheStructuralTransformationOfThePublicSphere
sources.description: Habermas The Structural Transformation Of The Public Sphere In this video, I look at Jurgen Habermas' book, the Structural Transformation of the Public Sphere, and its consequences today, especially in relation to questions about the internet.
